Reviews.Title: Perfect for Real Estate
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Being a Real Estate agent, I need a good camera to take photos of my listings.  In my business photos tell a story and are an important part of making an impression on the potential buyer.  This camera works perfectly.  The wide angle lens if great for taking shots of small rooms, which I could never get before.

Reviews.Title: Lovely Camera
Reviews.Author: dave_7799
Reviews.Content: the Fuji S4200 is a masterpiecetakes beautiful pictureswould reccomend this Camera to propective amateur photogophersfantastic bundle to give as a gift

Reviews.Title: fuji absent customer service
Reviews.Author: bbrogden
Reviews.Content: I purchased this same package from another retailer approximately a year ago.  After 2 weeks of testing I gave it a glowing review on their website.  How ever we have had several problems with this camera since then, all of which would be covered by fujifilm's one year warranty if they would return my emails or answer their phone.  We have been canon users for a long time before this camera and will be returning to them soon.  Buyers beware you really do get what you pay for in this particular segment.

ProductInfo.Name: Fuji - 600011995 - FinePix S4200 Digital Camera Bundle, 14 MP, 24x Optical Zoom; 6.7x Digital Zoom
